doc.title: Lego Harry Potter: Years 1-4
doc.plot: From the makers of Lego Star Wars, Lego Indiana Jones, & Lego Batman. And based off of the best selling novel and film series. Now for the first time ever play as Harry Potter in his first four years at Hogwarts in Lego form. From the search of the Sorcessor's Stone to the casting votes of the Goblet of Fire, experience everything you like about the series in a different way.
